overview: Dream Theater at Button South, Hallandale Beach, FL, USA  Lines in the Sand  Burning My Soul  Voices  Under a Glass Moon  Hollow Years  A Crack in the Mirror / Puppies on Acid  A Change of Seasons: II Innocence  Just Let Me Breathe  Peruvian Skies  Pull Me Under  Scarred  A Change of Seasons: IV The Darkest of Winters  The Ytse Jam [with drum solo]  New Millennium  A Change of Seasons: VII The Crimson Sunset  Metropolis Pt. 1: The Miracle and the Sleeper
title: Dream Theater: [1997] Falling Into Hallandale
